Subject: DRAFT SDNY PRESS GUIDANCE FOR WEDNESDAY JULY 31, 2019 
Date: Tue, 30 Jul 2019 20:51:31 +0000 
Importance: High 
Inline-Images: image001.png 
Chiefs: below is the draft daily press guidance for tomorrow, Wednesday, July 31,  2019.  Please reply with any 
needed additions, deletions, or corrections. 
EFTA00027567

Thanks, 
The Press Office. 
UNITED STATES ATTORNEY'S OFFICE 
Southern District of New York 
PRESS GUIDANCE 
Wednesday, July 31, 2019 
PROCEEDINGS AND EVENTS 
11:00 a.m. —  Pretrial conference in U.S. v. Jeffrey Epstein —  the defendant is charged with sexually exploiting and 
abusing dozens of underage girls by enticing them to engage in sex acts with him in exchange for money, and 
allegedly working with several employees and associates to ensure that he had a steady supply of minor victims 
to abuse, and paid several of those victims themselves to recruit other underage girls to engage in similar sex acts 
for money —  before Judge Berman (courtroom 17B, 500 Pearl Street). 
NIGHT DUTY 
OFFICER 
Follow us on Facebook I Follow us on Twitter I SDNY website
 I 
YouTube
*** FOR PLANNING PURPOSES ONLY *** 
DO NOT REPLY TO THIS MESSAGE. IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS, PLEASE CALL THE PRESS 
OFFICE AT (212) 637-2600.
EFTA00027568
